title: CONTAINERYARD / EVRART MURDER
description: "I wanna talk to you about the murder."

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Most certainly, Harry." The big ma..."
dialogueTree.text: "Most certainly, Harry." The big man nods merrily. "Nothing brightens my day like brainstorming these things with you."

links.title: You: ""I really went in there. Whose plac..."
links.text: "I really went in there. Whose place is it? I just need to know."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: You: ""What if it's connected to my case?""
links.text: "What if it's connected to my case?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Believe me, he's not a killer. He'..."
links.text: "Believe me, he's not a killer. He's a nobody. Just a basement-variety armchair fascist, who comes up with needlessly complex conspiracy theories."

links.title: Logic: "What if one of those *complex* theo..."
links.text: What if one of those *complex* theories is right?

links.title: You: ""Did one of his theories turn out t..."
links.text: "Did one of his theories turn out to be true?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""What if it did? What if he took a..."
links.text: "What if it did? What if he took a whack in the dark? Started telling people the strike is funded by a protection racket that drove local shops out of business?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""What if he planned to write a hack..."
links.text: "What if he planned to write a hack-piece to the local newspaper regarding these crazy theories he had developed. Just to stir up trouble. Wouldn't that be annoying?"

links.title: You: ""I see.""
links.text: "I see."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Journalism, Harry -- I love it, yo..."
links.text: "Journalism, Harry -- I love it, you love it, and you know why? Because we've got nothing to hide. Let's keep it that way."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Now please, let's get back to the..."
links.text: "Now please, let's get back to the good stuff, the police stuff, Harry! I just see myself as one of you guys. Think of me as a sergeant or something." He smiles broadly. "Let's *crack* this, Harry."

links.title: You: ""That'd be awful if I intervened in..."
links.text: "That'd be awful if I intervened in something like that."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Truly awful." He shakes his head...."
links.text: "Truly awful." He shakes his head. "It's great it didn't happen then. I personally love journalism. And I know you do too, Harry. That's because we've got nothing to hide, right?"

links.title: You: ""That's not a big deal. Certainly n..."
links.text: "That's not a big deal. Certainly not big enough to do something insidious."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Insidious? Would I ever ask you to..."
links.text: "Insidious? Would I ever ask you to do something insidious? Of course not!" He shakes his head. "I personally love journalism. And I know you do too. That's because we've got nothing to hide, right?"

links.title: You: ""That'd be cool. I live for shuttin..."
links.text: "That'd be cool. I live for shutting these journalist fucks down."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""So funny, Harry. I, of course, lov..."
links.text: "So funny, Harry. I, of course, love journalism. And I know secretly you do too. And you know why? Because we've got nothing to hide."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did one of his *complex* theories..."
links.text: "Did one of his *complex* theories turn out to be true?"

links.title: You: ""Okay, you're right. It's probably..."
links.text: "Okay, you're right. It's probably not important."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""See, Harry? Many questions become..."
links.text: "See, Harry? Many questions become irrelevant once we ask ourselves *why* we're even asking them." He winks at you. "But I'm sure you have plenty more where that came from."

links.title: You: ""There was a collection of colonial..."
links.text: "There was a collection of colonial mugs there, and I found a similar mug in the trash with the hanged man's clothes."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Racist mugs in the trash AND in th..."
links.text: "Racist mugs in the trash AND in the apartment?!" He grabs his head with both hands. "You guys are just light-years ahead of me."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I have *so much* confidence in the..."
links.text: "I have *so much* confidence in the ability of your organization. I'm relieved you're doing this and leaving me to do what *I* do best -- helping people. With the power of *politics*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes-yes... Do you think this 'weas..."
links.text: "Yes-yes... Do you think this 'weasel' is somehow connected to the murder?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, no, no, no, no. I don't cross..."
links.text: "Oh, no, no, no, no. I don't cross paths like that." He shakes his head, laughing. "All I want is for you to succeed in your investigation. I would never *complicate* things for you."

links.title: Drama: "Oddly, it seems to be true."
links.text: Oddly, it seems to be true.

links.title: You: ""But this weasel might have cleaned..."
links.text: "But this weasel might have cleaned up after the killers."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Believe me, Harry, he's a nobody...."
links.text: "Believe me, Harry, he's a nobody. Just your basement-variety nobody... Can't imagine him being connected to a high-calibre case like this."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But he *does* live nearby... maybe..."
links.text: "But he *does* live nearby... maybe it's a pedantic weasel? Fascists are neat freaks, if you don't mind me saying so. I feel like a real detective right now, Harry! Am I getting this right?" He imitates bashing something with an imaginary baton.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "With a police baton. Like a crook o..."
links.text: With a police baton. Like a crook or someone.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "That's not how you baton someone! T..."
links.text: That's not how you baton someone! The technique is way off. You strike with your whole body not just the baton...

links.title: You: ""Great technique. You'd make a grea..."
links.text: "Great technique. You'd make a great sergeant."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Would he? I'm not so sure about it.""
links.text: "Would he? I'm not so sure about it."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, you're too kind, Harry! Way to..."
links.text: "Oh, you're too kind, Harry! Way too kind." He chuckles. "I know I'm not a real police officer. *You* are!"

links.title: You: ""There's more to police work than w..."
links.text: "There's more to police work than whacking an imaginary baton."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, of course, Harry. I'm n..."
links.text: "Of course, of course, Harry. I'm not a real police officer. *You* are!"

links.title: Authority: "That's all he's going to say on thi..."
links.text: That's all he's going to say on this subject.

links.title: You: ""No. You have to put your weight be..."
links.text: "No. You have to put your weight behind it if you wanna do real damage."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, Harry," he bursts out laughing..."
links.text: "Oh, Harry," he bursts out laughing. "Thanks for the tip. I'll leave doing the 'real damage' to you -- you are the real police officer after all, not me."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, Harry. Stoic silence. I..."
links.text: "Of course, Harry. Stoic silence. I like that. Very befitting a police officer." He bows slightly in his chair. "I'm not a real detective. You are."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But he *does* live nearby -- maybe..."
links.text: "But he *does* live nearby -- maybe it's a pedantic weasel? Fascists are known to be neat freaks... I feel like a real detective right now, Harry! Am I getting this right?" He imitates bashing something with an imaginary baton.

links.title: You: ""Do you think this weasel has somet..."
links.text: "Do you think this weasel has something to do with my case?"

links.title: You: ""You said the lynching and the stri..."
links.text: "You said the lynching and the strike are related. How?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""By now I'm *sure* you've figured o..."
links.text: "By now I'm *sure* you've figured out who the dead man was working for -- the bad guys. Wild Pines. Sent to scare us. Another *violent measure* of the top hats against us flat caps."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, this strike is the culminat..."
links.text: "Harry, this strike is the culmination of many *many*, mistakes made by the Wild Pines Group. They tried to shut the strike down by sending in armed mercenaries."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean our victim?""
links.text: "You mean our victim?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: "He nods gravely. "A security contra..."
links.text: He nods gravely. "A security contractor. Can you imagine that? Workers standing in peaceful protest -- united in the spirit of fellowship! -- and they send hired killers to *mow* us down with machine gun fire."

links.title: Composure: "He performs a motion, as if sprayin..."
links.text: He performs a motion, as if spraying bullets from a machine gun.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm talking *beasts*, hardened kil..."
links.text: "I'm talking *beasts*, hardened killers from proxy wars in Yeesut, Semenine, Saramiriza -- you name it, they've done it. Raping, killing, burning villages -- killing little children for the Señorita Pineapple company, Harry..."

links.title: Half Light: "Those Señorita Pineapple people are..."
links.text: Those Señorita Pineapple people are scary motherfuckers, decimating your state if you don't give them your pineapples.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Everything they did there, they br..."
links.text: "Everything they did there, they brought over here. They want to turn Revachol into a Third World slum. Honestly, the only thing they didn't do, is kill the village elephant."

links.title: You: ""Hold on, you have a village elepha..."
links.text: "Hold on, you have a village elephant?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""No, Harry, the elephant is metapho..."
links.text: "No, Harry, the elephant is metaphorical and so is the village, but the mercs -- and their brutality -- are very real."

links.title: You: ""Go on.""
links.text: "Go on."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Now, I haven't *personally* witnes..."
links.text: "Now, I haven't *personally* witnessed the brutalities out there. I have the luxury of staying in my container, you see -- if I need to go somewhere, they just move my container." He laughs.

links.title: You: ""Wait, they move the container?""
links.text: "Wait, they move the container?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes! I'm an old man, Harry. My leg..."
links.text: "Yes! I'm an old man, Harry. My legs aren't what they used to be. They lift my office with that big crane. It's actually very fun, you should try it."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But enough about me and my fun con..."
links.text: "But enough about me and my fun container." His face turns serious. "The killers the company hired... I think there were three of them. All hardened commando-types."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""One of them got downright suicidal..."
links.text: "One of them got downright suicidal. Getting drunk, violent, a little rapey..." He shakes his head. "Even their own negotiator couldn't control him. That's your boy, the one who likes *hanging out* and trees."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""By *negotiator* you mean Joyce?""
links.text: "By *negotiator* you mean Joyce?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry," he says, ignoring the lieu..."
links.text: "Harry," he says, ignoring the lieutenant, "what you need to realize is -- we dockworkers are not pushovers."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What makes you think the Wild Pine..."
links.text: "What makes you think the Wild Pines negotiator can't control them?"

links.title: You: ""How did he end up hanging from tha..."
links.text: "How did he end up hanging from that tree?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, what you need to realize is..."
links.text: "Harry, what you need to realize is -- we dockworkers are not pushovers."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""We got grit, Harry -- this whole n..."
links.text: "We got grit, Harry -- this whole neighbourhood does. Push us hard enough and we push back -- and when we do..." He raises his finger. "We push to kill."

links.title: Half Light: "An entire neighbourhood of... kille..."
links.text: An entire neighbourhood of... killers.

links.title: You: ""Wait, the whole *neighbourhood* is..."
links.text: "Wait, the whole *neighbourhood* is in on it?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Potentially, Harry, potentially. W..."
links.text: "Potentially, Harry, potentially. We got arm wrestling champions, rowing club people, ex-coal miners -- tough guys, all ready to spring into action for their home base."

links.title: You: ""Who exactly did the *pushing*?""
links.text: "Who exactly did the *pushing*?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""There's a militant wing inside the..."
links.text: "There's a militant wing inside the Union. A group of people whose duties don't involve manual labour, but peacekeeping in the neighbourhood. Making sure everything runs smoothly."

links.title: Logic: "That sounds a bit like organized cr..."
links.text: That sounds a bit like organized crime.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""They're like you guys," he nods to..."
links.text: "They're like you guys," he nods to you and the lieutenant. "Idealistic people who want to make sure bad things don't happen. And if they already have... well, punishment must follow."

links.title: Logic: "Again: that sounds like organized c..."
links.text: Again: that sounds like organized crime.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So these *idealists* killed our vi..."
links.text: "So these *idealists* killed our victim?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Mhmh. One day Titus Hardie -- lead..."
links.text: "Mhmh. One day Titus Hardie -- leader of this peacekeeping faction -- comes up to me and says: 'Boss, socialist-democratic fervour drove us to take it upon ourselves to kill this beast that was burdening the land.'"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""He probably worded it differently,..."
links.text: "He probably worded it differently, but that was the idea. Sure sounded to me like they killed him." He chuckles. "I gave them two weeks paid leave and told them to lay low to avoid retaliation."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Aren't you worried we might arrest..."
links.text: "Aren't you worried we might arrest them for this?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, I'm not *at all* worried about..."
links.text: "Oh, I'm not *at all* worried about that. These are not the kind of men who get arrested. They're Martinaise boys, tough and gritty. I'd like to see the man who takes them in." He chuckles. "Besides I sent my lawyergirl to look after them."

links.title: Empathy: "Uncertainty belies his boasting. In..."
links.text: Uncertainty belies his boasting. In the end, though, he believes it -- or at least, he *wants to believe*.

links.title: Logic: "So he doesn't want to counter with..."
links.text: So he doesn't want to counter with a narrative that exonerates the Union. But why?

links.title: Empathy: "Despite his boastful tone, he's hav..."
links.text: Despite his boastful tone, he's having doubts about something -- but what?

links.title: Empathy: "Maybe he doesn't believe the boys *..."
links.text: Maybe he doesn't believe the boys *really* had it in them. They're his boys after all.

links.title: You: ""I think you're sharing information..."
links.text: "I think you're sharing information with the police, because you don't think they *actually* did it."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""That's very clever, Harry. Yes. Th..."
links.text: "That's very clever, Harry. Yes. They might have said it just to impress some girls or something." He rubs his chin. "But Titus has a bad temper, so the chances are 50-50."

links.title: Drama: "He thinks it's closer to 60-40. 60..."
links.text: He thinks it's closer to 60-40. 60 they didn't do it.

links.title: You: ""Okay. Another question.""
links.text: "Okay. Another question."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Certainly, Harry.""
links.text: "Certainly, Harry."

links.title: Empathy: "If he's just boasting then it sure..."
links.text: If he's just boasting then it sure doesn't feel like that to you. He's not worried.

links.title: Logic: "He places a lot of faith in that *l..."
links.text: He places a lot of faith in that *lawyergirl*. Perhaps this is a tactical error? Anyway.

links.title: You: ""Are you not afraid that we're goin..."
links.text: "Are you not afraid that we're going to arrest them?"

links.title: You: ""Did they kill the hanged man?""
links.text: "Did they kill the hanged man?"

links.title: You: ""Go on.""
links.text: "Go on."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""About my fun container?" He chuckl..."
links.text: "About my fun container?" He chuckles. "It's a hoot, Harry. Who knows, maybe you'll be in here the next time they move it. It will be very fun, I promise."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But enough about me and my contain..."
links.text: "But enough about me and my container." His face turns serious. "The killers the company hired... I think there were three of them. All hardened commando-types."

links.title: You: ""I think I've heard enough.""
links.text: "I think I've heard enough."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""No, you haven't, Harry." He waves..."
links.text: "No, you haven't, Harry." He waves at you with a jolly smile. "I haven't told you anything about the crime yet."

links.title: You: ""Our victim?""
links.text: "Our victim?"

links.title: You: ""I've talked to the boys and it tur..."
links.text: "I've talked to the boys and it turns out the hanging was a cover-up. They were helping a woman named Klaasje."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, they just blew smoke up..."
links.text: "Of course, they just blew smoke up my ass..." There's disappointment in his voice. "I guess they're not as tough as they say they are. Or there's more to this than meets the eye."

links.title: You: ""You're disappointed.""
links.text: "You're disappointed."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm not," he says with a widest of..."
links.text: "I'm not," he says with a widest of smiles. "But I guess you need to talk to this Klaasje person now. What a job!"

links.title: You: ""Do you know Klaasje?""
links.text: "Do you know Klaasje?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, the chick Titus and the boys h..."
links.text: "Oh, the chick Titus and the boys have been hanging around all winter?" He chuckles. "She has them wrapped around her finger. They're paying her rent, bringing her stuff..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Maybe that's connected too?" He se..."
links.text: "Maybe that's connected too?" He seems excited by the possibility. "I'm not some genius judge of character. What happened here is up to you to figure out, Harry."

links.title: You: ""Guess what? Not only was the hangi..."
links.text: "Guess what? Not only was the hanging a cover-up -- it was orchestrated by a woman named Ruby."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Ruby?" His belly rolls as he laugh..."
links.text: "Ruby?" His belly rolls as he laughs to himself. "You come across some wild characters, Harry, let me tell you! Ruby, huh? I guess you need to discuss her too?"

links.title: You: ""Do you know Ruby?""
links.text: "Do you know Ruby?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""No," he says looking at the swordf..."
links.text: "No," he says looking at the swordfish-clock inattentively. "I don't remember hiring any Rubies to the Hardie boys."

links.title: Logic: "There's more to this."
links.text: There's more to this.

links.title: You: ""So this Ruby is *not* running a dr..."
links.text: "So this Ruby is *not* running a drug operation for you, Evrart?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm gonna say *no*," he says decis..."
links.text: "I'm gonna say *no*," he says decisively. "I would say I don't have a drug operation, and if I did, I wouldn't have some Ruby, whom I don't even know, running it. I'd hire cops or... my mom. I don't even know, Harry."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm not a drug dealer." Suddenly h..."
links.text: "I'm not a drug dealer." Suddenly he starts laughing. "For a moment it seemed like you were on the track, had a good theory there, but now it's getting *convoluted*. My suggestion is to keep it *simple*. Truth is always simple."

links.title: Logic: "He's thinking: *Damn, what a mess...."
links.text: He's thinking: *Damn, what a mess. Good thing this isn't gonna come back to me.*

links.title: You: ""All right.""
links.text: "All right."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Indeed, my friend. All *is* right.""
links.text: "Indeed, my friend. All *is* right."

links.title: Conceptualization: "His smile is so wide it could blank..."
links.text: His smile is so wide it could blanket the universe.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "This woman may be running drugs for..."
links.text: This woman may be running drugs for him. There's no way he doesn't know her.

links.title: Empathy: "He *remains* honestly disappointed..."
links.text: He *remains* honestly disappointed they didn't kill him.

links.title: You: ""You're disappointed. Why did you w..."
links.text: "You're disappointed. Why did you want them to have killed him?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Why was I disappointed that they d..."
links.text: "Why was I disappointed that they didn't start a war? I'm not a floozy, Harry." He flashes you a sly smile. "You don't just get to second base with Evrart like this. We're at first base, Harry."

links.title: You: ""There were other things I was wond..."
links.text: "There were other things I was wondering about."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course there were." He nods."
links.text: "Of course there were." He nods.

links.title: You: ""There was a bullet in the hanged m..."
links.text: "There was a bullet in the hanged man's head."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""So they shot him?" He sounds pleas..."
links.text: "So they shot him?" He sounds pleasantly surprised.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He was shot in the head *before* h..."
links.text: "He was shot in the head *before* he was hanged."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""How odd." The man shrugs. "I don't..."
links.text: "How odd." The man shrugs. "I don't know what to say, lieutenant. They told me they hanged him. A hanged man is what I saw when I took a look into that yard..."

links.title: Drama: "It's impossible to say if he's tell..."
links.text: It's impossible to say if he's telling the truth, sire.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""What I *do* know is -- the case is..."
links.text: "What I *do* know is -- the case is in safe hands. If anyone can get to the bottom of this shot-and-hanged man, it's my favourite policeman -- Harry."

links.title: You: ""Yes. Someone shot him in the head..."
links.text: "Yes. Someone shot him in the head before they hanged him."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""How odd." The man shrugs. "I don't..."
links.text: "How odd." The man shrugs. "I don't know what to say, Harry. They told me they hanged him. A hanged man is what I saw when I took a look into that yard..."

links.title: You: ""How do you know the mercenaries we..."
links.text: "How do you know the mercenaries were hired by the shipping company?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""How do I know? Let me tell you abo..."
links.text: "How do I know? Let me tell you about these people." He slams his fist on the desk. "That's their MO. It's what they do."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Last winter some poor workers in T..."
links.text: "Last winter some poor workers in Terminal E went on a little strike. The company sent in *Sediment* -- a security contractor. The strike was over the workers' right to wear protective footwear, Harry."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""These guys turn up and start beati..."
links.text: "These guys turn up and start beating people. Tell you what, Harry, I wouldn't be surprised if we got the same mercenary company -- after a little *rebranding*. And I'm sure as hell not surprised to see an army of scabs under my gates."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So you believe the scabs were orga..."
links.text: "So you believe the scabs were organized by the security contractor?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You said it, Harry! Hell --" the f..."
links.text: "You said it, Harry! Hell --" the fist lands on the desk again -- "one of those guys looks big enough to take down that proverbial elephant! Boys like that don't just *happen* to show up during strikes."

links.title: You: ""The name of the company is Krenel..."
links.text: "The name of the company is Krenel this time. It might have been Sediment before."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, you're always one step..."
links.text: "Of course, you're always one step ahead of me, Harry. I'm no genius. I'm in this position because people *like* me."

links.title: You: ""The remaining mercenaries are orga..."
links.text: "The remaining mercenaries are organizing a tribunal to take on the Hardies."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Tribunal?" He appears aghast. "Tha..."
links.text: "Tribunal?" He appears aghast. "That sounds *serious* Harry. We Union men should be *shitting* ourselves..." He rubs his chin and smiles suddenly: "I wish you hadn't told me that. I'm gonna lose *sleep* over this. Let's change the subject."

links.title: Empathy: "He's clearly happy about the tribun..."
links.text: He's clearly happy about the tribunal.

links.title: You: ""You don't *seem* too worried about..."
links.text: "You don't *seem* too worried about it."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, Harry, what do I *really* thin..."
links.text: "Oh, Harry, what do I *really* think about the tribunal? You're trying to climb to second base with old Evrart before you've even courted him properly."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He wants you to do more *things* fo..."
links.text: He wants you to do more *things* for him before.

links.title: You: ""Okay. Yes.""
links.text: "Okay. Yes."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You're right, you're right. My sle..."
links.text: "You're right, you're right. My sleep isn't your concern -- tell me, Harry, what else can I help you with?"

links.title: You: ""Let's change the subject.""
links.text: "Let's change the subject."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""By all means, Harry. What's on you..."
links.text: "By all means, Harry. What's on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""Another question.""
links.text: "Another question."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Absolutely Harry, absolutely. Sock..."
links.text: "Absolutely Harry, absolutely. Sock it to me."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "That does sound quite unlikely, yes..."
links.text: That does sound quite unlikely, yes. The big guy leading the scabs at the gates is *colossal*.

links.title: Empathy: "He's not scared of them. If anythin..."
links.text: He's not scared of them. If anything, he *likes* them being here. Strange...

links.title: You: ""So you think the security contract..."
links.text: "So you think the security contractor organized the scabs?"

links.title: You: ""You mentioned a *lawyergirl*?""
links.text: "You mentioned a *lawyergirl*?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, Liz is a bright one!" He grins..."
links.text: "Oh, Liz is a bright one!" He grins broadly. "I paid for that law degree myself, thinking it'll probably turn her all fancy, but hell, Harry -- she came back a firebrand socialist! Sometimes she scares *me* with her zeal."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wait, the girl by the Whirling, who..."
links.text: Wait, the girl by the Whirling, who was keeping an eye on you -- is he talking about her?

links.title: Authority: "Don't give him the pleasure."
links.text: Don't give him the pleasure.

links.title: You: ""Did you send her to spy on me disg..."
links.text: "Did you send her to spy on me disguised as a gardener?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I did that, didn't I?" He snickers..."
links.text: "I did that, didn't I?" He snickers. "She thinks of herself as a guerrilla fighter. These middle-class kids and the books they read are crazy, Harry. I think she would rather be an *insurgent* than a lawyer. I hope it's a phase."

links.title: You: "(Better not to mention it.)"
links.text: (Better not to mention it.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh..." He smiles -- it's another b..."
links.text: "Oh..." He smiles -- it's another big grin. "And she also really likes *gardening* I hear. In March. Strange. Anyway, let's move on."

links.title: You: ""Tell me about Titus Hardie and his..."
links.text: "Tell me about Titus Hardie and his crew."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, they are simply fine young men..."
links.text: "Oh, they are simply fine young men -- all seven of them! Exemplary Union members. Always working to advance their position in the local socialist-democratic movement. Core members."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Old Theo used to run them, but thi..."
links.text: "Old Theo used to run them, but things really *kicked into gear* when Titus took the reins and named the group after himself." He starts laughing. "Gotta love his initiative."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Interesting. Who's second in comma..."
links.text: "Interesting. Who's second in command?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, they're almost all of them..."
links.text: "Harry, they're almost all of them *great* guys, born leaders. Whatever happened, I'm sure they only had the best interests of Revachol in mind."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Work with them -- hell, interview..."
links.text: "Work with them -- hell, interview them! But don't fight them. They really are just like you -- men who like beer, women, and some *order* on the streets."

links.title: Half Light: "Separate one from the herd."
links.text: Separate one from the herd.

links.title: You: ""So let me ask you this... Which on..."
links.text: "So let me ask you this... Which one of Hardie's boys is your least favourite?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, that would definitely be Fat A..."
links.text: "Oh, that would definitely be Fat Angus. His feet smell from a city-block away and he's always having noisy stomach troubles. Horrible, revolting guy."

links.title: You: ""So let's say something happens to..."
links.text: "So let's say something happens to Fat Angus... let's say a citizen's arrest..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You would die, Harry," he says, gr..."
links.text: "You would die, Harry," he says, grinning. "You would die and in the process start a bloody and completely unnecessary war between the Débardeurs' Union and the Citizens Militia."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Angus, his ever-growling stomach,..."
links.text: "Angus, his ever-growling stomach, and his smelly feet are all part of the Union. You have as much right to *arrest* him as I have to arrest your partner here." He points to the lieutenant.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Actually less, because this is my..."
links.text: "Actually less, because this is my home town, my territory and my backyard. You are a guest here, Harry. Please remember that."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh Harry..." He starts laughing. "..."
links.text: "Oh Harry..." He starts laughing. "This is getting real grim and there's no need for that. We are friends." He sits back and looks you in the eye with a wide smile.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Angus, his ever-growling stomach,..."
links.text: "Angus, his ever-growling stomach, and his smelly feet are all part of the Union. You have as much right to *arrest* him as he has to arrest you... "

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""...actually less, because it's his..."
links.text: "...actually less, because it's his home and his backyard. You are a guest here, Harry. Please remember that."

links.title: You: ""What if I were to pin this on some..."
links.text: "What if I were to pin this on someone and just quietly..."

links.title: You: "Better not to."
links.text: Better not to.

links.title: Half Light: "Or what -- he'll give you info? Fin..."
links.text: Or what -- he'll give you info? Fine, don't ask it then.

links.title: Authority: "That's him *allowing* the police to..."
links.text: That's him *allowing* the police to ask his men questions.

links.title: Logic: "He's betting on them being useless..."
links.text: He's betting on them being useless to you.

links.title: You: ""Where can I find them? The Union b..."
links.text: "Where can I find them? The Union booth in the Whirling was empty."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You know, what, Harry?" He points..."
links.text: "You know, what, Harry?" He points both index fingers at you. "I got a feeling they're gonna show up in full force *tomorrow*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant marks something in h..."
links.text: The lieutenant marks something in his notebook.

links.title: You: ""Where can I find them?""
links.text: "Where can I find them?"

links.title: You: ""What more can you tell me? Who's s..."
links.text: "What more can you tell me? Who's second in command? Who's the most violent?"

links.title: You: ""In the future, I could use your ba..."
links.text: "In the future, I could use your backing. Can you ask the Hardie boys to cooperate?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But of course! It's the least I ca..."
links.text: "But of course! It's the least I can do for my good friend, Harry. I'll do it right after we've concluded this talk."

links.title: Authority: "You can now go and tell Titus about..."
links.text: You can now go and tell Titus about this. See what he has to say.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Also, Harry, here's five reál." He..."
links.text: "Also, Harry, here's five reál." He holds out a banknote.

links.title: You: ""Wait, why are you giving it to me?""
links.text: "Wait, why are you giving it to me?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm not giving you anything. I'm j..."
links.text: "I'm not giving you anything. I'm just holding out five reál."

links.title: Volition: "Needless to say, this is another *m..."
links.text: Needless to say, this is another *move*. Don't take it.

links.title: You: "Take it."
links.text: Take it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant watches you pocket t..."
links.text: The lieutenant watches you pocket the bank note. He looks a little puzzled.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "How many micro-bribes would this gu..."
links.text: How many micro-bribes would this guy take?

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Good boy, a real team player." He..."
links.text: "Good boy, a real team player." He rubs his hands together. "Now -- do you have any more questions?"

links.title: You: ""I don't need it, I only wanted you..."
links.text: "I don't need it, I only wanted you to help me with the Hardie boys."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, I wasn't offering it to you, j..."
links.text: "Oh, I wasn't offering it to you, just holding it out there." He pockets the bill. "But I am willing to share *information*. Was there anything else?"

links.title: Authority: "When you meet this *Titus*, tell hi..."
links.text: When you meet this *Titus*, tell him about this. See what he has to say.

links.title: You: ""Good talk. Let's conclude for now.""
links.text: "Good talk. Let's conclude for now."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""By all means, Harry. What's on you..."
links.text: "By all means, Harry. What's on your mind?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""*Was* it a good talk?" He leans ba..."
links.text: "*Was* it a good talk?" He leans back, suddenly worried. "I'm not sure we made much headway here. I was hoping we'd bust the case wide open, heck, I even wanted to tell you what I *really* want to achieve with the strike..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I don't know what happened, Harry...."
links.text: "I don't know what happened, Harry. I wanted you to feel like Mr. Martinaise! And, of course -- I also wanted you to *find your gun*." Great sadness comes over him. "But... it's like I can't completely trust you. Yet."

links.title: You: ""Yet?""
links.text: "Yet?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, Harry. It's like I can't *ful..."
links.text: "Yes, Harry. It's like I can't *fully* trust you if you're not a man of the left," he says, slowly shaking his head. "I *want* to, but I just can't..."

links.title: Rhetoric: "A man of the left? So you have to b..."
links.text: A man of the left? So you have to be a social democrat?

links.title: Empathy: "He's been *hurt* too much in the pa..."
links.text: He's been *hurt* too much in the past -- by men who aren't *social democrats*.

links.title: You: ""I am not a 'man of the left'. I'm..."
links.text: "I am not a 'man of the left'. I'm a patriot of Revachol."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Just between us, I don't care for..."
links.text: "Just between us, I don't care for those lefty dinks either." He immediately changes course. "It's all about *power* and here's how we're gonna get it -- I need you to be my kingsman, Harry."

links.title: Authority: "Kingsman? Yes! Please, let's be tha..."
links.text: Kingsman? Yes! Please, let's be that.

links.title: You: ""You're right not to trust me. I ta..."
links.text: "You're right not to trust me. I take care of *me*. I'm a hustler. I grind. I'm a money engineer."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Perfect, Harry! That's perfect!" h..."
links.text: "Perfect, Harry! That's perfect!" he claps his hands. "My version of the left is not against the companies. It's *with* the companies. Honestly, what I have in mind is a business proposal. A left-wing business proposal, but still..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And what would this entail?""
links.text: "And what would this entail?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Once again I require nothing uneth..."
links.text: "Once again I require nothing unethical or illegal of you. You just need to get two little signatures on this piece of paper." He pulls out an envelope. "And then mail it to my accountant in La Delta."

links.title: You: ""Kim, what do you think of this?""
links.text: "Kim, what do you think of this?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It depends. I don't think what we..."
links.text: "It depends. I don't think what we just got from Mr. Claire was very useful." He studies Evrart.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "But, he thinks, it's your call."
links.text: But, he thinks, it's your call.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""As I said, it weighs on me heavily..."
links.text: "As I said, it weighs on me heavily..." He bows his head in shame, then looks up and smiles: "But once we get *really* talking... well, I'm gonna hand you the keys to Martinaise! And maybe even help you figure out who's behind this killing."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's saying as little as possible a..."
links.text: He's saying as little as possible as vaguely as he can. Deliberately omitting things.

links.title: You: ""What are the signatures for?""
links.text: "What are the signatures for?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm glad you asked, Harry -- the U..."
links.text: "I'm glad you asked, Harry -- the Union is going to build a modern youth centre in Martinaise!" He grins broadly. "It will be *righteous*. We're gonna get those teenagers off drugs -- and *on* roller skates!"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Rollerskating -- not drugs, Harry...."
links.text: Rollerskating -- not drugs, Harry. You like this.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""There's a nameless little street o..."
links.text: "There's a nameless little street on the coast with some old houses around it. Most people have already signed. I just need *two* more signatures to get this mission off the ground, Harry."

links.title: You: ""You mean the fishing village?""
links.text: "You mean the fishing village?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, yes, the little cul-de-sac on..."
links.text: "Yes, yes, the little cul-de-sac on the coast. Where all the men have drowned -- in either the sea or the bottle. A gloomy place, doesn't have that Union attitude."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You're already pretty deep into thi..."
links.text: You're already pretty deep into this. What's a little more? No one can see you here in Martinaise...

links.title: You: ""Where is this *place* exactly?""
links.text: "Where is this *place* exactly?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""On the coast, Harry. Across the ca..."
links.text: "On the coast, Harry. Across the canal. There's a cul-de-sac there -- a little *village* they're calling it. A gloomy place. You'll find it. I trust your detective skills, Harry."

links.title: Shivers: "Water drips from the eaves. A woman..."
links.text: Water drips from the eaves. A woman looks at her freshly tarred skiff. There's a pair of cavalry boots under the fish in the box and the wind howls like a vicious spirit...

links.title: You: ""What will happen to the current oc..."
links.text: "What will happen to the current occupants?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""They're just gonna have to deal wi..."
links.text: "They're just gonna have to deal with the construction noise for six months and then they'll be living like kings -- right next to a fancy new youth centre, designed by the best architects from Stella Maris."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Is he absolutely sure the tenants w..."
links.text: Is he absolutely sure the tenants won't be thrown out in the street?

links.title: You: ""Are you 100% sure no one's going t..."
links.text: "Are you 100% sure no one's going to end up homeless?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Am I...?" The big man shakes his h..."
links.text: "Am I...?" The big man shakes his head in disbelief. "Harry, these people... Martinaise is the most important thing in my life. I would never let anything bad happen to them."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""We're gonna build a youth centre t..."
links.text: "We're gonna build a youth centre there. The value of their properties goes up and kids have a place to play in. I'm looking out for these people, not pulling the rug from under them, Harry. I'm looking out for all of Martinaise, not just the harbour."

links.title: Empathy: "He means it."
links.text: He means it.

links.title: You: ""Sounds like everybody wins.""
links.text: "Sounds like everybody wins."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""The people win, Harry." He nods so..."
links.text: "The people win, Harry." He nods solemnly and repeats: "The people win."

links.title: You: ""Fine, if I happen to be there, I c..."
links.text: "Fine, if I happen to be there, I can ask them." (Accept the task.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You bring joy to my heart, Harry -..."
links.text: "You bring joy to my heart, Harry --  such a pleasure to be working with you. Here..." He hands you an open white envelope.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You need to get signatures from Is..."
links.text: "You need to get signatures from Isobel Sadie and Lilienne Carter. The cul-de-sac is right past the pawnshop and across the canal. I heard there was some trouble with the water lock, but it should be fixed now."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Once you have the signatures, mail..."
links.text: "Once you have the signatures, mail this to 13022 La Rocca, district of La Delta. Then we can talk." He runs his fingers through his thin hair.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You need to get signatures from Is..."
links.text: "You need to get signatures from Isobel Sadie and Lilienne Carter. The cul-de-sac is right past the pawnshop and across the canal. I hear there is some trouble with the water lock, but they should fix it by Wednesday morning."

links.title: You: ""No, I'm not going to do this." (Re..."
links.text: "No, I'm not going to do this." (Reject the task.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Perfectly acceptable." He smiles...."
links.text: "Perfectly acceptable." He smiles. "No one's gonna force you into anything, but I don't know about that gun of yours... You see, I'm a vengeful man, Harry. Part of how I got where I am is that, well -- I can be quite nasty sometimes."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But the good news is, the moment y..."
links.text: "But the good news is, the moment you change your mind and want to look into this matter -- just tell me, and we'll be buddies again." He smiles pleasantly.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant's eyes meet yours an..."
links.text: The lieutenant's eyes meet yours and he shrugs.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Okay. Fine."
links.text: Okay. Fine.

links.title: You: ""Let's change the topic.""
links.text: "Let's change the topic."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""By all means, Harry!" He nods exci..."
links.text: "By all means, Harry!" He nods excitedly. "What's on your mind?"

links.title: Interfacing: "He thinks he can force you into his..."
links.text: He thinks he can force you into his scheme. You can turn this around on him if you accept.

links.title: Endurance: "If you can stomach agreeing, you ca..."
links.text: If you can stomach agreeing, you can turn this around on Evrart. And physically speaking -- you *can* stomach it.

links.title: Logic: "Agreeing to take the contracts does..."
links.text: Agreeing to take the contracts does not equate to you agreeing to actually help him...

links.title: Authority: "Take the documents off him and you..."
links.text: Take the documents off him and you take his power.

links.title: You: ""What would this entail?""
links.text: "What would this entail?"

links.title: You: ""What's that supposed to mean?! I'm..."
links.text: "What's that supposed to mean?! I'm more left than *you* are."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You're saying it, but I don't beli..."
links.text: "You're saying it, but I don't believe you. You know how it is -- company snitches, *agent provocateurs* everywhere... I'm barricaded in this fortress of mine, and I need to get a message out. Will you help me?"

links.title: You: ""This is another corrupt scheme, is..."
links.text: "This is another corrupt scheme, isn't it? I'm neither left nor right. I do what my *heart* tells me to do."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""What does your heart tell you abou..."
links.text: "What does your heart tell you about your lost gun, Harry? Does it tell you to forget about it? Or do you think it wants to be found?" He picks something from his teeth. "I think it's lonely and cold. I think it wants to be found and I have a proposal for you."

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""I'm very glad to hear that, Harry,..."
dialogueTree.text: "I'm very glad to hear that, Harry," he says with a smile. "One question: you didn't actually happen to stumble in and see what's inside the apartment, did you?"

links.title: Drama: "He's trying to figure out if you're..."
links.text: He's trying to figure out if you're lying.

links.title: Suggestion: "There is no way to sway this man in..."
links.text: There is no way to sway this man in any direction. He is un-suggestable and un-swayable. Just tell the truth.

links.title: You: ""I *may have* gone inside and seen..."
links.text: "I *may have* gone inside and seen a collection of racist mugs."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Just as I thought. Culturally anti..."
links.text: "Just as I thought. Culturally antiquated mug collection. What a weasel..." He shakes his head. "*Pissing* on Evrart's Rainbow Coalition."

links.title: Drama: "He *was* testing you. And you succe..."
links.text: He *was* testing you. And you succeeded.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Now let's get down to brass tacks...."
links.text: "Now let's get down to brass tacks. It's time for men like me and you to figure out who's killed who and why." He pretends to roll up his sleeves. "Real police work is gonna start happening now. I promise you, Harry, this is gonna be good."

links.title: You: ""I did go inside. Weasel had the fl..."
links.text: "I did go inside. Weasel had the flag of the Old Revachol on his wall."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Exactly the kind of fascist memora..."
links.text: "Exactly the kind of fascist memorabilia I was expecting." He shakes his head. "Weasel probably prays to it every night for the downfall of the Union."

links.title: You: ""I did go inside. He had the glorio..."
links.text: "I did go inside. He had the glorious flag of *Revachol the Suzerain* on his wall."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""The *weasel* is no true patriot, H..."
links.text: "The *weasel* is no true patriot, Harry." He shakes his head. "He prays every night for the downfall of the Union -- and spits upon the name of the king."

links.title: You: ""The deal wasn't for me to go insid..."
links.text: "The deal wasn't for me to go inside, so I didn't."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You're right, Harry. You only had..."
links.text: "You're right, Harry. You only had to unlock the door." He gives you a clever look. "Which you did, so we're all good here."

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Are you shitting me, Harry? Did yo..."
dialogueTree.text: "Are you shitting me, Harry? Did you not really open the door and are now just telling me you did?" His lively eyes are mapping your face. "You're a wild one, Harry!"

links.title: You: ""No, no, Evrart. I really did open..."
links.text: "No, no, Evrart. I really did open the door."

links.title: Drama: "Good, now take it a bit further. Ta..."
links.text: Good, now take it a bit further. Take it home.

links.title: You: ""And not only did I open it, I went..."
links.text: "And not only did I open it, I went inside too. It was a real weasel's den, Evrart."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I bet it was, Harry." He says with..."
links.text: "I bet it was, Harry." He says with a grimace -- then the smile dissipates. "But seriously, what did you see in his apartment?"

links.title: Drama: "A guy who has antagonized the Union..."
links.text: A guy who has antagonized the Union in a Union-run town? Maybe it's political?

links.title: You: ""I saw lot of anti-socialist, anti-..."
links.text: "I saw lot of anti-socialist, anti-union stuff. Pamphlets saying: *Get the unions in check*."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""That's exactly what I thought, Har..."
links.text: "That's exactly what I thought, Harry!" He slams his fist on the table. "What a weasel... And for the record, I was only curious, not testing you."

links.title: Drama: "He was testing you. You succeeded."
links.text: He was testing you. You succeeded.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Thank you, Harry. You have shown m..."
links.text: "Thank you, Harry. You have shown me that the Débardeurs' Union and the Citizens Militia can indeed work together." He nods solemnly. "Now, let's cut down to brass tacks."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""It's time for men like me and you..."
links.text: "It's time for men like me and you to figure out who's killed who and why." He nods. "Real police work is gonna start happening now. I promise you, Harry, this is gonna be good."

links.title: You: "(Shake your head.) "Fascist insigni..."
links.text: (Shake your head.) "Fascist insignia everywhere. Memorabilia calling for the *Return to the Golden Age*."

links.title: You: ""Misogynist posters, racist literat..."
links.text: "Misogynist posters, racist literature and a signed petition to 'euthanise the invalids'."

links.title: Drama: "You didn't say it with nearly enoug..."
links.text: You didn't say it with nearly enough confidence.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Be it far from me to ever question..."
links.text: "Be it far from me to ever question your integrity, Harry, but you must have opened the wrong door," he says with a wry smile. "Next time, please be certain you get the right one."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You see, Harry, it only benefits m..."
links.text: "You see, Harry, it only benefits me if you open the right door. If you open the wrong door, then it makes things harder for me, 'cause now you're scaring random people in my district."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I don't want them to be scared. I..."
links.text: "I don't want them to be scared. I want them to think, 'Wow, I feel so safe. I like Evrart.' I only want weasels to be scared."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shrugs."
links.text: The lieutenant shrugs.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "He means: "Fuck it, let's open the..."
links.text: He means: "Fuck it, let's open the door then."

links.title: You: ""You're right, I was just testing y..."
links.text: "You're right, I was just testing you."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, Harry!" He exclaims. "W..."
links.text: "Of course, Harry!" He exclaims. "What are friends for if not for measuring the falsehood one can pass in the disguise of truth."

links.title: You: ""Actually, I need to get back to yo..."
links.text: "Actually, I need to get back to you on this door thing."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, Harry..." He shakes his head,..."
links.text: "Oh, Harry..." He shakes his head, smiling. "You don't need to get back to me. You need to open the door. Very simple, really."

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, of course. That's your main th..."
dialogueTree.text: "Oh, of course. That's your main thing here. That's *why* you're in Martinaise." He nods. "I know everything that goes on around here and I would *love* to discuss it with you."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I mean, it's no secret that the ly..."
links.text: "I mean, it's no secret that the lynching is connected to the strike -- so much to talk about! Honestly, it's been weighing on me so heavily. I understand -- you need to *interview* me..."

links.title: You: ""I sense there's a *but*.""
links.text: "I sense there's a *but*."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry," the big man says with a tr..."
links.text: "Harry," the big man says with a tragic look on his face. "Had you asked me earlier, I could have used your help in dealing with a certain weasel. It would have really *solidified* our friendship."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Sadly the moment has passed and th..."
links.text: "Sadly the moment has passed and the weasel's back in its den. Nothing to do about it now, so get this --" He points at you. "-- I'm just going to *give* you the information, because I like you, Harry."

links.title: Logic: "There's probably more to that."
links.text: There's probably more to that.

links.title: You: ""Wait, who was the 'weasel'?""
links.text: "Wait, who was the 'weasel'?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""The time has passed, Harry. Were y..."
links.text: "The time has passed, Harry. Were you not listening, when I just said that? Pay attention please." He wiggles his chubby index finger at you. "Now, do you want to hear about the hanging or not?"

links.title: You: ""The weasel-thing sounds fun, wish..."
links.text: "The weasel-thing sounds fun, wish I could have done that."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Yes, that would have been the inte..."
links.text: "Yes, that would have been the interesting way to do things. For both of us really. But you were too slow." His expression turns to compassion. "But do not despair over this minor hiccup, Harry. I *will* tell you about the murder."

links.title: You: ""Yes, let's talk about the murder.""
links.text: "Yes, let's talk about the murder."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Fantastic! Time for men like me an..."
links.text: "Fantastic! Time for men like me and you to figure out who's killed who and why." His fist lands on the desk. "Real police work is gonna start happening now. I promise you, Harry, this is gonna be good."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""...but there's a *thing* that's be..."
links.text: "...but there's a *thing* that's been keeping me up at night. I *want* to talk about the hanging. I mean... if we could just calmly talk, exchange information, we could blow this thing wide open!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. That sounds good," the lieute..."
links.text: "Yes. That sounds good," the lieutenant says with a slow nod. "Let's do that."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""But I *can't* think straight with..."
links.text: "But I *can't* think straight with this thing weighing on me..." He slaps himself on the forehead. "You're a police officer, aren't you? I have a crazy idea. You guys are basically door-opening machines. Incredibly talented at opening doors."

links.title: You: ""I've opened a few doors in my life.""
links.text: "I've opened a few doors in my life."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""And I'm sure you're gonna open thi..."
links.text: "And I'm sure you're gonna open this one with flying colours, Harry." He chuckles. "This really is very simple and there's nothing shady about it."

links.title: Drama: "An excellent opportunity presents i..."
links.text: An excellent opportunity presents itself, sire! You could win the trust of the arch-liar, pretend to play into his hand -- then, should you wish, bend his efforts towards your own!

links.title: You: ""Why don't you just open it yoursel..."
links.text: "Why don't you just open it yourself?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, I'm a very busy man and, mo..."
links.text: "Harry, I'm a very busy man and, more importantly,  I don't have that extraordinary physique you do." He slams his fists together. "You look like you could run around all day!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You want to send someone a message..."
links.text: "You want to send someone a message that the police are working for you."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I repeat, I'm a very, *very* busy..."
links.text: "I repeat, I'm a very, *very* busy man, Mr. Kitsuragi, and therefore I must occasionally enlist... outside help." He turns back to you. "So what will it be, Harry?"

links.title: Authority: "He wants to send a message: "Even t..."
links.text: He wants to send a message: "Even the police are working for me."

links.title: You: ""Whose door is it?""
links.text: "Whose door is it?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, no one's. It's just a weasel...."
links.text: "Oh, no one's. It's just a weasel. A weasel lives there. Nothing for you to worry about."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean by a 'weasel'?""
links.text: "What do you mean by a 'weasel'?"

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""A loud blabbering weasel. When wea..."
links.text: "A loud blabbering weasel. When weasels feel no one is watching, they start acting *foolishly...*" He removes his glasses and rubs his nose.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Just go there, unlock the door and..."
links.text: "Just go there, unlock the door and leave it open. It's been such a burden on me, Harry. I just want this to be over so I can discuss business with you." He puts his glasses back on.

links.title: You: ""I bet you don't even know anything..."
links.text: "I bet you don't even know anything about the hanging."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Harry, my dear friend." He sinks d..."
links.text: "Harry, my dear friend." He sinks deeper into the chair. "I am what people call a *local big wig*. I know everything that goes on in Martinaise."

links.title: You: ""Damnit, fine, I'll look into it, w..."
links.text: "Damnit, fine, I'll look into it, we need to talk about that murder." (Accept the task.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Fantastic, my friend! Just let me..."
links.text: "Fantastic, my friend! Just let me know when it's done and we can take our friendship to the next level." He flicks his fingers.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""You can get the key from Mañana --..."
links.text: "You can get the key from Mañana -- he's down by the gates. Mañana's like a free agent in the Union. Special operations. Hardened socialist. A real free-thinker too. He'll tell you precisely where the door is." He smiles, obviously satisfied with how well he planned it all out. "One last thing, Harry."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Just open the door. You don't need..."
links.text: "Just open the door. You don't need to go in or anything. I just want that weasel to come home and see the unlocked door."

links.title: You: ""I can't accept this thing." (Refus..."
links.text: "I can't accept this thing." (Refuse the task -- for now.)

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Of course, Harry, I understand. Bu..."
links.text: "Of course, Harry, I understand. But if that's the case, I don't think we'll *ever* find your gun. Even worse -- we won't be able to speak like equals about the murder..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Perhaps this was just bad timing f..."
links.text: "Perhaps this was just bad timing for you? Know that you can *always* come back to me. I really hope you do." He winks at you. "For your sake, my sake -- and for your gun's sake too."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs. "Yes -- we bo..."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs. "Yes -- we both understand what you meant."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "This may be the only way, he thinks..."
links.text: This may be the only way, he thinks. I won't hold it against you. In fact, we  probably *should* reconsider later.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Sure. I understand. But if that's..."
links.text: "Sure. I understand. But if that's the case, I don't think we'll *ever* get to speak like equals. Beautiful friendship unrealized. I really hope you'll change your mind, Harry..."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Does this jiggling ooze think he's..."
links.text: Does this jiggling ooze think he's going to *use* you? He's got another thing coming. Play his game, son, with your eyes peeled. He's going to slip up, and when he does -- you're going to come out on top.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Keep it cool, baby boy. You can use..."
links.text: Keep it cool, baby boy. You can use this, groove with this. Play along, let him throw his weight around -- and when he throws it too much, and you've got him off guard, that's when your trip him up.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The stars aligned into a cosmic fro..."
links.text: The stars aligned into a cosmic frown here. He has your fate decided. Bide your time, however, and let the stars continue their course -- and that frown shall turn into a smile. Only if you play along...

links.title: You: ""You've heard wrong Evrart. We're n..."
links.text: "You've heard wrong Evrart. We're not."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Oh, you're being too modest, my fr..."
links.text: "Oh, you're being too modest, my friend." He chuckles. "But don't worry. This annoying thing I have is completely legal. I just need you to open a door."

links.title: You: ""Kim, is that true? Are we door-ope..."
links.text: "Kim, is that true? Are we door-opening machines?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not sure I understand." He loo..."
links.text: "I'm not sure I understand." He looks to the Union boss. "If you're asking us to break down someone's door, it's not going to happen."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Come now. I just need you to go op..."
links.text: "Come now. I just need you to go open a *little* door for me -- and leave it unlocked. A simple thing. Absolutely nothing shady about it."

links.title: You: ""Yes, let's blow it open.""
links.text: "Yes, let's blow it open."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

dialogueTree.title: Evrart Claire: ""A fantastic change of heart, Harry..."
dialogueTree.text: "A fantastic change of heart, Harry!" He rubs his nose. "Go talk to Mañana down by the gates. He'll brief you and give you the key."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "And just like that, it's happening..."
links.text: And just like that, it's happening -- the roller coaster is moving. Too late to take it back now.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Just open *one little door*. You d..."
links.text: "Just open *one little door*. You don't need to go in or anything. I just want that weasel to come home and see the unlocked door. That's it. Anything else we should discuss?"
